## Installation
- Noctalia Control Center -> Plugins -> Sources -> add:
  `https://github.com/DFSko/noctalia-dock-plugin`

## Compatibility
- Plugin id: `noctalia-dock-plugin`
- Noctalia Shell: `>= 4.5.0`

## Versioning
- This release follows SemVer.
- Update `manifest.json` and `CHANGELOG.md` together for each release.
